content:
System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices Namespace

Definition

The System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices namespace provides classes for changing words from singular to plural form, and vice versa.

In this Article

Classes

PluralizationService

Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.

Interfaces

ICustomPluralizationMapping

Represents a collection of the singular and plural forms of words.
